meanings.definition: Payment of an amount greater than what is due.
meanings.sent1: The overpayment was returned to the customer.
meanings.sent2: She received an overpayment for her work and had to give back the extra money.
meanings.sent3: The overpayment made everyone laugh because it was so much more than expected.
meanings.sent4: His generosity was like an overpayment for the small favor she did for him.
meanings.sent5: The overpayment stood out like a bright light in the dark room of finances.

meanings.definition: The act of paying too much.
meanings.sent1: After realizing the overpayment, they requested a refund.
meanings.sent2: The overpayment was a mistake that needed to be corrected immediately.
meanings.sent3: The overpayment caused confusion but was quickly resolved.
meanings.sent4: Her overpayment was a reminder to always double-check the bill.
meanings.sent5: The overpayment was like a surprise gift, but not in a good way.
